name: RIS_SUPP_STAFF
description: This table contains the staff who supported the technologist at Begin/End Procedure.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for supporting staff associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SUPP_STAFF_ID
columns.description: The ID of the supporting staff for a procedure.

columns.name: SUPP_STAFF_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
